LanguageData.Plant_SyrTea.label: tea plant
LanguageData.Plant_SyrTea.description: A green, leafy plant yielding tea leaves. These leaves can be brewed into a tasty beverage.
LanguageData.SyrRawTea.label: tea leaves
LanguageData.SyrRawTea.description: Raw tea leaves. Best prepared as a beverage.
LanguageData.SyrTea.label: tea
LanguageData.SyrTea.description: A delicious hot cup of tea. It helps staying calm, reducing the effects of stress. This means less food consumption and more joy during recreation.
